data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Dedza, Malawi, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dedza, Malawi
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Dedza you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Dedza to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, we pray that the people of Dedza, Malawi will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Lord, please remember the Swahili people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, help the 5,273 believers find a person of peace today among the 25,727 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 5,273 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.section_summary:
the state of Dedza, Malawi has a population of 31,000.

We estimate Dedza has 5,273 people who might know Jesus, 18,189 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,538 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 5,273 believers in Dedza to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
